item.name: Dust Pods
entries: You hide fragile pods of pollen or other clinging powder that get in the eyes of the first creature that enters the snare's square. The creature must attempt a DC 17 Reflex saving throw. A creature {@condition dazzled} by the pollen can use an {@action Interact} action to attempt a DC {@flatDC 5} flat check to remove the condition.

entries.Success: The creature is {@condition dazzled} for 1 round.
entries.Failure: The creature is {@condition dazzled} for 10 minutes.
entries.Critical Failure: The creature is {@condition blinded} for 1 round and {@condition dazzled} for 10 minutes after.

item.name: Fang Snare
entries: You set snake fangs, poison stingers, or other venomous animal parts in the ground where they can be touched or stepped on by a creature that enters the snare's square.
The first creature to enter the square must attempt a DC 20 Reflex saving throw.

entries.Failure: The target takes 1 piercing damage and {@damage 2d8} poison damage.
entries.Critical Failure: The target takes 2 piercing damage and {@damage 4d8} poison damage.

item.name: Grasping Tree
entries: You rig tree branches, thin strands of bark, or other plant matter to close in on a creature that enters the snare's square. The first creature to enter the square must attempt a DC 19 Reflex saving throw.

entries.Failure: As success, plus the target is {@condition flat-footed}.
entries.Critical Failure: The target takes {@damage 2d4} slashing damage and is {@condition immobilized} until it destroys the snare (AC 16, HP 25) or Escapes (DC 19).

item.name: Thunder Snare
entries: The snare makes a thunderous noise when a creature enters the snare's square, which can be heard up to 1,000 feet away. The creature must attempt a DC 18 Fortitude saving throw.

entries.Success: The target is {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn.
entries.Failure: As success, and the target also takes 1 sonic damage.
entries.Critical Failure: As success, and the target also takes {@damage 1d4} sonic damage.

item.name: Torrent Snare
entries: You pile waterlogged plants or access a nearby source of water to rain down on a Medium or smaller creature that enters the snare's square. When a creature enters the square, the snare's square and all adjacent squares become slippery difficult terrain, and the triggering creature must attempt a DC 19 Reflex saving throw, with the following effects.

entries.Critical Failure: The target falls {@condition prone} and is forced into one of the other squares soaked by the snare.
